text:
Producer! That live today,
it was just downright fantastic, wasn't it?

You sang, you danced,
you performed at the top of your game!

Wearin' them cute outfits,
and all the fans just lovin' it...

Just makes me love bein' an idol even more~~!
That's what I thought!!

Haha, that's good.
The jumping part was also well received.

Hehehe~...
practiced a whole heap, ya know~!

Afterwards, gonna watch the video real good...
Make sure I'm dancin' just right, ya hear!
